title: 1233 N Ogden St #404-Denver-Brand New Paint, Assigned Parking, & More!
posting_body: This downtown condo has it all; Assigned Parking !
This 4th level unit in Capitol Hill is walking distance to all of your favorite locations.
Water, trash, and access to the community workout space is also included in rent!
Conveniently located walking distance from Cheesman Park, Denver Botanic Gardens and Congress Park.
Unit also includes a spacious balcony and a fireplace!
Call/Text us today to schedule a showing-you don't want to miss this opportunity to live downtown!
KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, garbage disposal
LAUNDRY: Card-operated Laundry on each floor
HEAT/COOLING: Radiator baseboard heating window AC unit
PARKING:1 Assigned Parking space OFF-STREET and Street Parking!
Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 2 weeks of the property's listed availability date.
Initial leases are to end April through July of 2023
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
